trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Burlington
There were no other sightings in Burlington on or around October 8th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsGoing to work at 2am and I see 2 bright red orbs to the left of me high in the sky. One orb was higher then the other but they were pretty close together. the lower orb on the right side I noticed had a little bit of a white light. Being near the airport I know what aircraft lights look like and that the air traffic controller wouldnt let 2 commercial aircraft get that close a few miles from the airport. To be certain I opened up my flight radar app on my phone while driving to check knwon commerical flights around the airport and there was none. I wanted to pull over to shoot a video or take a pic but I was running late for work. For the 30 seconds I was in view of them they didnt flash or move or make noise.
